title: Nathan Tokyo
short: An inspirational portfolio website for Nathan Taylor
body: Nathan Taylor is a freelance designer & developer based in Tokyo, and his personal website is a true delight! Featuring great design aesthetics, surprise hover animations and a high level of interactivity. This is a fine demonstration of eye-catching creativity. [Check it out](https://nathan.tokyo/)! ## Related Posts: * [Inspirational Agency Portfolio Websites \[April 2020]](https://www.easeout.co/blog/2020-04-01-inspirational-agency-portfolio-websites-april-2020)
